SEARCH
Package edu.ntnu.idatt1002.baecon.controller

Class SettingsController

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt1002.baecon.controller.SettingsController
public class SettingsController extends Object
The SettingsController class is responsible for handling user settings and notifying listeners when these settings are updated.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SettingsController()
    Constructs a new SettingsController with the default file and initializes it with the saved settings.
    SettingsController(BaeconFiles baeconFiles)
    Constructs a new SettingsController with the default file and initializes it with the saved settings.

    getSettings()
    Gets the current user settings.
    void
    removeListener(SettingsListener listener)
    Removes a listener so that it will no longer be notified when the user settings are updated.

    Sets whether the colorblind mode of the user's settings is enabled and notifies listeners of the change.

    void

  • Constructor Details

    • SettingsController

      public SettingsController()
      Constructs a new SettingsController with the default file and initializes it with the saved settings. If there are no saved settings, handle the exception.

    • SettingsController

      public SettingsController(BaeconFiles baeconFiles)
      Constructs a new SettingsController with the default file and initializes it with the saved settings. If there are no saved settings, handle the exception.

  • Method Details

    • getCurrency

      public String getCurrency()
      Gets the currency currently set in the user's settings.
      Returns:
      the currency currently set in the user's settings

    • setCurrency

      public void setCurrency(String currency)
      Sets the currency of the user's settings and notifies listeners of the change.
      Parameters:
      currency - the new currency to set

    • getColorBlindMode

      public boolean getColorBlindMode()

    • setColorBlindMode

      public void setColorBlindMode(boolean colorBlindMode)
      Sets whether the colorblind mode of the user's settings is enabled and notifies listeners of the change.
      Parameters:
      colorBlindMode - whether colorblind mode should be enabled

    • getNegativeNumbersInRed

      public boolean getNegativeNumbersInRed()
      Returns whether the colorblind mode is currently enabled in the user's settings.
      Returns:
      true if colorblind mode is enabled, false otherwise

    • setNegativeNumbersInRed

      public void setNegativeNumbersInRed(boolean negativeNumbersInRed)
      Sets whether negative numbers in the user's settings should be displayed in red and notifies listeners of the change.
      Parameters:
      negativeNumbersInRed - whether negative numbers should be displayed in red

    • getSettings

      public Settings getSettings()
      Gets the current user settings.
      Returns:
      the current user settings

    • addSubscriber

      public void addSubscriber(SettingsListener listener)
      Adds a listener to be notified when the user settings are updated.
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to add

    • removeListener

      public void removeListener(SettingsListener listener)
      Removes a listener so that it will no longer be notified when the user settings are updated.
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to remove
